events.content: The First Reported Case.(Based on the information we have now.)

A study in The Lancet,The symptom onset date of the first patient identified was Dec 1st, 2019. This patient had a history of exposure to Huanan(or South China) Seafood Market, which was identified as a point of origin of the pandemic.

SARS-like Coronavirus Drawing Attention.
Dr. Li Wenliang and other doctors, tried to warn their fellows that there were 7 confirmed SARS-like Coronavirus cases found, and they all have contact history of Wuhan seafood market.
On the same day, an urgent notification issued by Wuhan Health Commission, ordered all hospitals to report any related information, but forbidden releasing any information to the outside.
Wuhan notified the public for the first time about 27 cases of viral pneumonia, but denial of Human to Human Transmission
Taiwan initiated a standard disease control measure at its border, and send the email to WHO to request the infos of suspicious quarantine in China.
Jan 1st, Seafood Market closed and cleaned up without any investigation. Wuhan issued summons to Dr. Li, accusing him of spreading rumors. And he contracted the virus himself around Jan 10th.

• More punishment of whistleblowers, patients flocking to hospitals.
  • News reported that Xi Jinping Stepping In.
  • WHO Endorses China, advises against the application of any travel or trade restrictions on China.

From Jan 6th to Jan 17th, three important annual political conferences of Wuhan city and Hubei province commenced in Wuhan.

During this period, 11 days, zero new cases were reported.

Spring Festival Travel Rush

40 Days: 01.10 ~ 02.18

  • 2019 3 Billion person-time by 2019
  • 2020 1.47 Billion person-time by 2020

Source
WHO: Chinese authorities have found no clear evidence of human-to-human transmission of the novel coronavirus
Next day, Wuhan: limited human transmission cannot be ruled out, but the risk of continued human transmission is low.

Right after the conferences end, Wuhan resumed its daily updates.

Social media took down messages related to the over capacity of hospitals.
Grand Banquet, attended by more than 40,000 families in Baibuting Community, hosted as the plan.
Taiwan CDC set up Disease Control Center.

Dr. Zhong Nanshan admitted for the first time in a China Central Television interview that the virus could indeed be spread from human to human and that 14 medical workers infected by one single patient.

Xi: strengthen the guidance of public opinion, strengthen the propaganda and interpretation, maintain the overall stability of society and ensure that the people spend a stable and happy Chinese New Year.

Wuhan and few other cities in Hubei locked down.

According to South China Morning Post, 5 million left Wuhan before lockdown, 1,000 new coronavirus cases expected in city.

WHO decided not to declare the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak a global emergency…

At this time, there is no evidence of human-to-human transmission outside China, Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the W.H.O.’s director general, That doesn’t mean it won’t happen.
Wuhan mayor under pressure to resign over response to coronavirus outbreak. Later (Jan 27), he go live on CCTV and says Beijing rules partially responsible for lack of transparency.
Chinese/Lunar New Year Eve 2020

WHO: the global risk from the deadly virus in China was high, admitting an error in its previous reports that said it was moderate.

This is an emergency in China, but it has not yet become a global health emergency.
Xi Jinping meets with visiting World Health Organization (WHO) Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus

WHO declared COVID-19 as Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC).

At that time, the risk to other nations was deemed low.

Xi: telling the moving stories of how [people] on the front line are preventing and fighting the virus, telling the story of how China is combating the virus, and showcasing the unity of the Chinese people in the face of the virus
China’s central propaganda department said on Tuesday (Feb. 4) that it would dispatch more than 300 journalists to [Hubei and Wuhan] report on the disease.

Whistle-blower Dr Li Wenliang confirmed dead, thousands of comments has been shown in his Weibo account.

Nearly 1 million comments on May 2020.

We now have a name for the disease and it's 'COVID-19', says WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.

Also, China doesn't need to ask to be praised… because we have seen these concrete things that should be appreciated.

Some countries slow to respond to the virus, the Global Times, China's state-run mouthpiece wrote that that four countries where cases of COVID-19 have suddenly exploded, Japan, South Korea, Iran, and Italy, are reacting too slowly to contain the outbreak.

Feb 24, The WHO-China Joint Mission on COVID-19 held a press conference, Bruce Aylward, senior adviser to the director-general of the WHO said “the measures China has taken offered experience of improving the global response to the disease,” and If I had COVID-19, I'd want to be treated in China, To the people of Wuhan, it is recognized that the world is in your debt.
51d after “human transmission” admitted WHO declared Pandemic

Chinese state media Xinhua News Agency: The world should thank China for its gargantuan efforts and sacrifices to prevent the spread of the disease to other countries, an act that is really startling the universe and moving the gods (驚天地、泣鬼神), and United States owes China an apology.

且「美國欠中國一個道歉」

Videos of grateful Italians singing China’s national anthem from their balconies went viral.

Tweets using the hashtags #GrazieCina (#ThanksChina) and #forzaCinaeItalia (#GoChina&Italy) were artificially promoted—37 percent and 46 percent of them, respectively, were proven to have been generated by bots.

A billboard thanking Xi Jinping for China’s coronavirus assistance in Belgrade, Serbia.

Thank you, Big brother Xi

April 2020

Djordje Kojadinovic / Reuters
